import './App.css'; import './styles/styles.css' import React from 'react'; import Number from './components/numbers/number' import Operation from './components/operations/operation' import Action from './components/actions/action' function App() { const [num, setNum] = React.useState(0); function handleClick(props) { setNum(num + props.num); console.log(num); } const showNumber = (newNumber)=>{ setNumber(newNumber); } return (
); } export default App;
